content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Consensual and non-consensual BDSM and bondage scenes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Runs on low-end systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Runs on low-end systems
